CYP2D6.UM: Avoid codeine due to increased risk of morphine toxicity (use alternative analgesic)
CYP2D6.PM: Avoid codeine due to lack of efficacy (consider alternative analgesic)
CYP2D6.IM: Consider alternative analgesic or monitor closely

CYP2C19.PM: Use alternative antiplatelet agent (e.g., prasugrel or ticagrelor) due to reduced effectiveness
CYP2C19.IM: Consider alternative therapy or enhanced monitoring

CYP2C9.PM: Initiate with lower maintenance dose and use genotype-informed dosing algorithms; increase monitoring of INR
CYP2C9.IM: Consider moderate dose reduction and close INR monitoring

SLCO1B1.LowFunction: Use lower dose or consider alternative statin (increased myopathy risk)

TPMT.PM: Avoid azathioprine or greatly reduce starting dose; consider alternative therapy
TPMT.IM: Start at reduced dose (e.g., 30%-70% of standard) with careful monitoring

DPYD.PM: Avoid fluoropyrimidines or use alternative therapy due to high risk of severe toxicity
DPYD.IM: Reduce dose (often 25%-50% depending on activity score) and monitor closely
